title: Temperature Check: Elect Calvin Blanchard
body:
CONTEXT:
Braintrust’s Dispute Resolution Process is designed to facilitate community-led arbitration should there be an invoice dispute between clients and talent transacting on the platform. 
This process requires the leadership of a community member who can be trusted to guide the program through 2021.
[Learn More](https://usebraintrust.com/dispute-resolution) about Dispute Resolution: 
[Learn More](https://app.usebraintrust.com/help-center/dispute-resolution/learn-about-dispute-resolution-from-a-specific-user-type/jury-arbitrator-learn-about-the-process-if-youre-a-jury-arbitrator) about the Jury Arbitrator Role

PROBLEM:
The Braintrust community has not officially elected a Jury Arbitrator to lead the process. 

SOLUTION:
I nominate that Calvin Blanchard is elected as the Jury Arbitrator.
Calvin has been a member of the Braintrust community since April 2021 and is currently on a contract with an enterprise client as a Program Manager.  The client has reported nothing but favourable interactions with Calvin. 
Calvin has completed Jury Member Training for Dispute Resolution and has demonstrated a clear understanding of the process.
Calvin volunteered to be the Jury Arbitrator in July 2021 and has successfully shadowed two disputes and helped herald professional and amicable conclusions.  

EXECUTION:
Electing Calvin Blanchard grants him access to the Claim Response Form and all case files. 
He will be a part of all Disputes until the end of 2021.  

VOTE:
Vote FOR if you would like to elect Calvin Blanchard
Vote AGAINST if you would not like to elect Calvin Blanchard
author: 0x33F3A1e8fDBc5e85fbA15cA7F00D0098068777f3
